root.description: Lists all port forwarding rules for an IP address.

param.name: account
param.description: List resources by account. Must be used with the domainId parameter.

param.name: domainid
param.description: list only resources belonging to the domain specified

param.name: id
param.description: Lists rule with the specified ID.

param.name: ipaddressid
param.description: the id of IP address of the port forwarding services

param.name: isrecursive
param.description: defaults to false, but if true, lists all resources from the parent specified by the domainId till leaves.

param.name: listall
param.description: If set to false, list only resources belonging to the command's caller; if set to true - list resources that the caller is authorized to see. Default value is false

response.name: id
response.description: the ID of the port forwarding rule

response.name: cidrlist
response.description: the cidr list to forward traffic from

response.name: ipaddress
response.description: the public ip address for the port forwarding rule

response.name: ipaddressid
response.description: the public ip address id for the port forwarding rule

response.name: privateendport
response.description: the ending port of port forwarding rule's private port range

response.name: privateport
response.description: the starting port of port forwarding rule's private port range

response.name: protocol
response.description: the protocol of the port forwarding rule

response.name: publicendport
response.description: the ending port of port forwarding rule's private port range

response.name: publicport
response.description: the starting port of port forwarding rule's public port range

response.name: virtualmachinedisplayname
response.description: the VM display name for the port forwarding rule

response.name: virtualmachineid
response.description: the VM ID for the port forwarding rule

response.name: virtualmachinename
response.description: the VM name for the port forwarding rule
